PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-22142002-12-13,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
Financial Administration Act
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (a) to ACQUIRE a parcel of land of approximately 2,446 m² in the Township of Gloucester, (b) to CONVEY some 3.41 hectares of vacant land in the Township of Nepean to the City of Ottawa , and (c) to EXTEND existing easements granted to the City of Ottawa for the Glen Cairn Trunk Sewer and the Alvin Heights Pullback Sewer.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION (a) to ACQUIRE a parcel of land of approximately 2,446 m² in the Township of Gloucester, (b) to CONVEY some 3.41 hectares of vacant land in the Township of Nepean to the City of Ottawa , and (c) to EXTEND existing easements granted to the City of Ottawa for the Glen Cairn Trunk Sewer and the Alvin Heights Pullback Sewer.
